tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I have shown Dr. Vishal Sood, for the first time, 23 years back and since then got treatment in utmost filling requirement in 2023/24 besides scaling of teeth  4 times only.
The best part about Dr. Vishal Sood is that he is not only customer friendly, have all ultra modern facilities in his clinic but has trained team of other supporting Doctors and trained staff who all lay more stress on  precautions to be taken rather than advising treatment unless and untill it is utmost necessacity.
I advise public in general whoever has any dental related issues must visit at least once to have self experience and am sure it will truly justify my experience.

I highly recommend this dental practice to anyone seeking top-notch care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Vishal Sood is a great find in our Mayur Vihar area. 
Dr Sood is a true professional, **** ************* ** *** ****** ****** ********* *** *********** very patient in his approach, very gentle during procedures and a good  human being. We visited him for a wisdom tooth pain and extraction was advised. He explained to us the latest techniques and after our concurrence advised the following:
a) Use of piezosurgery which is a novel technique that utilizes piezoelectric vibrations in the application of cutting bone tissue from the tooth using ultrasonic frequency. This makes the extraction easier, painless to a point and less blood flow.
b) Use of  Platelet-Rich Plasma (PRP) Therapy, where platelets derived from the patient's blood through centrifugal process is inserted in the tooth socket for early rebuilding of the damaged part.
Both the above applications were used by Dr Sood in our case. Result was safe and quick extraction (less than 7 minutes), no pain as area was numb with anasthesia, and subsequent filing of the socket with PRP and two small sutures. The cut healed much faster and sutures were removed after one week, the cut was almost healed. Recovery has been great and we are extremely happy with the innovative approach and procedure.
If tooth extraction scares you, Dr Sood is your answer. God bless him!
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words. Hope we keep on giving the best to our patients.

review: I visited Dr Vishal Sood for a severe tooth pain. After diagnosis it was found that there was an urgent need for tooth extraction since my teeth were severely damaged.  The way doctor explained the entire case patiently and answered all my queries several times I was certain that I am at the right place. I have had very unpleasant experiences in the past but I am glad I found Dr Vishal Sood. I later also got tooth implant done, it was a long protocol, but the doctor patiently attended me several times even after the procedure was completed. I am really happy with the service. Also, adviced my son to get his wisdom tooth extraction. He is also extremely satisfied. Would definitely recommend Dr. Sood.
reply_text: Thank you for kind words.

review:
This is the first time I am writing a review for someone. And that's because I genuinely felt that I should write for Dr Vishal Sood. I had a great experience visiting him. I visited him with my wife. Her case was a bit complicated since she is 7 months pregnant. But Dr Vishal was extremely careful with her case. He solved her problem without any risk to her pregnancy. The atmosphere of his clinic is also very positive. You'll have to visit to experience that. I strongly recommend everyone to consult him. Not five stars, I give unlimited stars.

Regards,
Srinivasan
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words wish you all the best Sir

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Vishal is an extremely patient and dedicated professional. I had to get my impacted wisdom tooth extracted and my mom's directed me to him. He took time out to understand and explain me the complications involved in my case and the possible ways of extracting it. 

With an angular tooth and a curved root, he put all his efforts and expertise to remove the tooth in one piece and not having to section it - all so that the healing is faster and the blood loss is minimal. 

He is always available to address any issues I might have over phone / chat to ensure easy recovery post the extraction. 

I have another tooth to get extracted and I know the place to go for that now.
reply_text: Thank you .Ms. Himani hope we continue to give best of our services and care.
